answers.answer: There are two conditions that may be associated with Viagra one is the "blue vision" which seems to be harmless and extremely common. The other association is not proven and that is a condition called anterior non-arteritic ischemic optic neuropathy. The problem is that this condition often occurs in older men, many of whom smoke, have HBP, high cholesteral or other risk factors.Yes you should see an Eye MD as soon as you can.  Asprin won't help now.JCH MD
